unnormalised: **Vaishno Devi Yatra: Chaos & Chai at 6 AM**
normalised: **Vaishno Devi Yatra: Chaos and Chai at six A.M.**

unnormalised: Jammu, J&K: Sources confirm that the annual Vaishno Devi pilgrimage is off to its usual chaotic start. Initial reports suggest over 50,000 devotees attempted the climb by 6:00 AM, fueled primarily by copious amounts of chai and unwavering faith (mostly in finding a shortcut, according to one anonymous devotee). The shrine board, attempting to manage the rush, has implemented a new "express lane" for those willing to bribe a local panda (kidding...mostly).
normalised: Jammu, J-and-K: Sources confirm that the annual Vaishno Devi pilgrimage is off to its usual chaotic start. Initial reports suggest over fifty thousand devotees attempted the climb by six zero zero A.M., fueled primarily by copious amounts of chai and unwavering faith (mostly in finding a shortcut, according to one anonymous devotee). The shrine board, attempting to manage the rush, has implemented a new "express lane" for those willing to bribe a local panda (kidding...mostly).

unnormalised: The infamous ponywallahs are reportedly charging â‚¹2500 for a ride up, a price steeper than the incline itself, prompting many to opt for the good ol' shanks' mare. "My back is killing me, but at least I saved some rupees!" exclaimed Rakesh Kumar from Delhi, hobbling past our reporter.
normalised: The infamous ponywallahs are reportedly charging rupee two thousand five hundred for a ride up, a price steeper than the incline itself, prompting many to opt for the good old shanks' mare. "My back is killing me, but at least I saved some rupees!" exclaimed Rakesh Kumar from Delhi, hobbling past our reporter.

unnormalised: Adding to the adventure, the weather forecast predicts a 70% chance of rain later today. Pilgrims are advised to carry umbrellas and a hefty dose of patience, as slippery slopes and overcrowded shelters are practically guaranteed.
normalised: Adding to the adventure, the weather forecast predicts a seventy percent chance of rain later today. Pilgrims are advised to carry umbrellas and a hefty dose of patience, as slippery slopes and overcrowded shelters are practically guaranteed.

unnormalised: A minor stampede was averted near Ardhkuwari when a monkey made off with a pilgrim's packet of Parle-G biscuits. Authorities have issued a warning: "Do not feed the wildlife, unless you want to become part of a Bollywood-esque chase scene. It could also cost u more than a broken hip."
normalised: A minor stampede was averted near Ardhkuwari when a monkey made off with a pilgrim's packet of Parle-G biscuits. Authorities have issued a warning: "Do not feed the wildlife, unless you want to become part of a Bollywood-esque chase scene. It could also cost you more than a broken hip."

unnormalised: Despite the madness, the spirit of devotion remains high. "It's all part of the experience, bhai!" chirped Aisha Khan from Mumbai, cheerfully dodging a rogue auto-rickshaw near the Katra base camp. "Where else can u find such a combo of spiritual awakening and near-death experiences?" Indeed, the Vaishno Devi yatra: not for the faint of heart, or those who take their morning chai lightly.
normalised: Despite the madness, the spirit of devotion remains high. "It's all part of the experience, bhai!" chirped Aisha Khan from Mumbai, cheerfully dodging a rogue auto-rickshaw near the Katra base camp.
